src:
Manchester United vs Partizan Belgrade: Tuan Rumah Diprediksi Menang 2-0
07 Nov 2019, 20:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mantan pemain Arsenal, Charlie Nicholas memberikan prediksi terkait pertandingan antara Manchester United vs Partizan Belgrade dini hari nanti. Nicholas percaya bahwa Setan Merah akan memenangkan pertandingan ini dengan skor 2-0.
Manchester United akan melanjutkan perjalanan mereka di Liga Europa dini hari nanti. Mereka akan menghadapi wakil Serbia, Partizan Belgrade di Old Trafford untuk pertandingan keempat grup L.
United sendiri saat ini baru saja menelan kekalahan jelang laga ini. Mereka tumbang dengan skor 1-0 melawan Bournemouth di akhir pekan kemarin.
Nicholas menyebut bahwa United sendiri sudah menunjukkan perbaikan di skuat mereka. "Kami mencoba melihat di sekeliling Manchester United, dan kami melihat ada perkembangan di dalam tim ini," ujar Nicholas kepada Sky Sports.

Baca analisis eks pemain Liverpool itu di bawah ini.
text:
Manchester United vs Partizan Belgrade: Host Predicted to Win 2-0
Nov 7 2019, 20:00 by Bola.net
Former Arsenal player Charlie Nicholas gives a prediction regarding the match between Manchester United vs. Partizan Belgrade in the early morning. Nicholas believes that the Red Devils will win this match by a score of 2-0.
Manchester United will continue their journey in the Europa League in the morning. They will face Serbia's representative, Partizan Belgrade at Old Trafford for the fourth group L match.
United itself has just swallowed up ahead of this fight. They fell 1-0 against Bournemouth at the weekend.
Nicholas said that United themselves have shown improvements in their squad. "We are trying to look around Manchester United, and we see developments in this team," Nicholas told Sky Sports.

Read the analysis of the former Liverpool player below.
